DisplayCheckHoldsSettings.description: Settings for displaying check holds in account history

enabled.description: Whether check holds display is enabled

checkHoldMemoRange.description: Range specification for check hold memos

guaranteedFundsMemoRange.description: Range specification for guaranteed funds memos

shouldShowAsNegativeTransactions.description: Whether to display check holds as negative transactions

displayCheckHoldsOutsideDateRange.description: Whether to display check holds outside the selected date range
